meanings.definition: To form small bends or ripples on a surface.
meanings.sent1: She crinkles the paper to make it look old.
meanings.sent2: The old map crinkles easily when touched.
meanings.sent3: The cat crinkles the wrapping paper while playing.
meanings.sent4: His smile crinkles the corners of his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The autumn leaves crinkle underfoot as she walks.

meanings.definition: Small bends or ripples on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The crinkles on the fabric give it a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: She ironed out the crinkles in the tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The crinkles in the road made the bike ride bumpy.
meanings.sent4: The crinkles in the paper made it hard to read the text.
meanings.sent5: The crinkles in the pond reflected the sunlight beautifully.
